actions.committee: House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs).

official_title: A concurrent resolution to collect overdue debts.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that it shall be the policy of the United States to require repayment of delinquent debts of foreign nations. Declares it the sense of Congress that the Department of the Treasury shall submit a list of such debts to the Congress and make arrangements with foreign nations for such repayment.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to collect overdue debts.
